infos.value: ...Tch. I guess even I have a limit to how many soldiers I can fell.
Not so talkative now, are we?
Oh, that's nice. Talking down to me like that...it's getting me all excited.
Nevertheless...this is where I retreat.
Next time we meet, I hope it's just the two of us.
Should we go after him?
Though it is vexing, Camillo is incredibly skilled. I am afraid I am no match for him on my own.
I see.
...What of your allies?
They are fighting to the bitter end at Ovis Castle. Alas...
It's possible that they now have no reason to fight...
Fear not, my lady. The castle may fall, but the princess and her guards have already fled the kingdom.
I see... Then they'll be needing reinforcements.
Y-you'll really aid us!?
Rundall cannot go unpunished. Ready the soldiers at once.
I am afraid that will not be happening.
What is the meaning of this?
This is what I mean.
Monks...from the Sanctum!?
You've sold out your own kingdom?
May the light of the Crystals guide us.
Lady Mach√©rie...
Get behind me, Deah.
